processingCommand.script:
! Stop modules
:SET &MODULES# = ""

:SET &WMS_STOP#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_STOP#      = "false"
:SET &RW_STOP#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_STOP#       = "false"
:SET &WMS_FAIL_STOP#  = "false"
:SET &REFS_FAIL_STOP# = "false"
:SET &RW_FAIL_STOP#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_FAIL_STOP#  = "false"
:SET &WMS_DB_STOP#    = "false"
:SET &REFS_DB_STOP#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_DB_STOP#    = "false"

:IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &SERVER_NAME#
:    SET &WMS_STOP# = "true"
:    SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "WMS,")
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &SERVER_NAME#
:    SET &REFS_STOP# = "true"
:    SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "REFS,")
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &SERVER_NAME#
:    SET &RW_STOP# = "true"
:    SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "RW,")
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = &SERVER_NAME#
:    SET &EMS_STOP# = "true"
:    SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "EMS,")
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &SERVER_NAME#
:    SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&MODULES#, "*WMS*")
:    IF &RET# = "N"
:      SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "WMS,")
:    ENDIF
:    SET &WMS_FAIL_STOP# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &SERVER_NAME#
:    SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&MODULES#, "*REFS*")
:    IF &RET# = "N"
:      SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "REFS,")
:    ENDIF
:    SET &REFS_FAIL_STOP# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &SERVER_NAME#
:    SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&MODULES#, "*RW*")
:    IF &RET# = "N"
:      SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "RW,")
:    ENDIF
:    SET &RW_FAIL_STOP# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# <> ""
:  IF &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = &SERVER_NAME#
:    SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&MODULES#, "*EMS*")
:    IF &RET# = "N"
:      SET &MODULES# = STR_CAT(&MODULES#, "EMS,")
:    ENDIF
:    SET &EMS_FAIL_STOP# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_STOP#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&MODULES#)
:IF &LENGTH# > 0
:  SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:  SET &MODULES# = SUBSTR(&MODULES#, 1, &LE#)
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &MODULES#,,WORKFLOW
